text: Battle for the Planet of the Apes is a 1973 American science fiction movie directed by J. Lee Thompson and is the fifth and final movie in the original Planet of the Apes series. It stars Roddy McDowall, Claude Akins, Natalie Trundy, Severn Darden, Lew Ayres, John Huston, Austin Stoker, France Nuyen and John Landis and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. Battle for the Planet of the Apes was the final Planet of the Apes movie to be rated G. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1973 science fiction movies Category:Planet of the Apes movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by J. title: Battle for the Planet of the Apes
